long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gamefied is bringing the play-to-earn model to millions of gamers through NFT renting and guild formations without them spending heavily on buying assets.

The wallet is a custom browser extension for Chromium based browsers and is working in synergy with the entire Gamefied guild ecosystem that has scholar/captain/master panels.

The wallet restricts scholars from withdrawing any assets they got via scholarship and they get their earnings in a separate Ethereum or Polygon based wallet.
